paragraphs: Organized Crime And Corruption Reporting Project had it's website dated from the last decade. They needed a redesign.
We've managed to come up with a modern, newspaper-like design with clean headlines, good structure, clean understanding of priorities.
The new site supports all screens from mobile devices up to large projectors.
